title: If I want to get into caricature drawing, is it best to start with realistic drawings and then move into caricatures? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes. Unless you know exactly how a human face, or animal face for that matter, is put together you will never be able to effectively exaggerate it. Having an eye for which features to exaggerate and in what way also helps. First, look at the realistic drawing of President Trump and compare it to the caricatures that follow. Look at the caricatures of President Trump and how each one chooses a different feature to exaggerate or exaggerates the same features but in different ways. An effective caricaturist has an eye for choosing just the right features to emphasize.

If you want to become a caricaturist it is must that you observe more. Initially basic portrait drawings skills are necessary to draw a caricature. But for become an expert in caricatures observation of facial features is much than only you will be able to exegratte the features and convert a portrait into caricature with the likeness of character.
